Get USPORTS football defence stats

Source: R/football_defence.R
football_defence.Rd

Get USPORTS football defence stats

Usage

football_defence(year = c())

Arguments

year

The season(s) of interest.

Value

A tibble.

Examples

football_defence(2018)
#> # A tibble: 5,002 × 21
